description: This ameta describes how to perform card payments using Rave's APIs

payload.public_key: Required - true: This is a unique key generated for each button created on Rave’s dashboard. It starts with a prefix FLWPUBK and ends with suffix X.
payload.tx_ref: Required - true: This is a unique reference, unique to the particular transaction being carried out. It is generated by the merchant for every transaction.
payload.amount: Required - true: This is the amount to be charged it is passed as - (“amount”:10).
payload.currency: Required: true : This is the specified currency to charge the card in. With Rave you can charge cards in more than 90 currencies, all you need to do is pass the specified currency you would like to charge the in.
payload.email: Required - true: This is the email address of the customer.
payload.phone_number: Required - false: This is the phone number linked to the customer's mobile money account.
payload.subaccounts: Required - false: This is an array of objects containing the subaccount IDs to split the payment into.
payload.client_ip: Required - false: IP - Internet Protocol. This represents the current IP address of the customer carrying out the transaction.
payload.device_fingerprint: Required - false: This is the fingerprint for the device being used. It can be generated using a library on whatever platform is being used.
payload.type: Required - true: This specifies that the payment method being used. it should be passed as a query params which can be - card, account and so on.
payload.redirect_url: Required - false: This is a url you provide, we redirect to it after the customer completes payment and append the response to it as query parameters. (3DSecure only)
payload.card_number: Required - true: This is the number on the cardholders card. E.g. 5399 6701 2349 0229.
payload.cvv: Required - true: Card security code. This is 3/4 digit code at the back of the customers card, used for web payments.
payload.expiry_month: Required - true: Two-digit number representing the card's expiration month.
payload.expiry_year: Required - true: Two- digit number representing the card's expiration year.
payload.meta: Required - false: This is to include additional payment information
payload.authorization: Required - false: This is an object that should contain the authorization mode, pin, and biller address
payload.preauthorize: Required - false:  This should be set to true for preauthoize card transactions
payload.mode: Required - false: The Auth model to use when validating - e.g pin, avs_noauth or avs

data.processor_response: Please enter the OTP sent to your mobile number 080****** and email te**@rave**.com
